(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN If)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VBP ask)
        (S
          (NP (NNP Ban) (NNP Mian))
          (NP (NNS fans))
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB where))
            (S
              (NP (PRP they))
              (VP (VBP get)
                (NP (PRP$ their) (NNP Ban) (NNP Mian) (NN fix))))
            (, ,)))))))


mark(ask-3, If-1)
nsubj(ask-3, you-2)
root(ROOT-0, ask-3)
nn(Mian-5, Ban-4)
nsubj(get-9, Mian-5)
dep(get-9, fans-6)
advmod(get-9, where-7)
nsubj(get-9, they-8)
xcomp(ask-3, get-9)
poss(fix-13, their-10)
nn(fix-13, Ban-11)
nn(fix-13, Mian-12)
dobj(get-9, fix-13)


(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP they))
      (VP (MD will)
        (ADVP (RB undoubtedly))
        (VP (VB start)
          (S
            (VP (VBG listing)
              (PRT (RP out))
              (NP (DT the) (NNS stalls))
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NNS fingers))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (CD one) (NN hand))))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (MD would)
        (VP (VB bet)
          (SBAR (IN that)
            (S
              (NP (NNP China) (NNP Whampoa))
              (VP (MD will)
                (VP (VB be)
                  (PP (IN among)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT the) (CD five) (NNS stalls))
                      (VP (VBN listed)))))))))))
    (. .)))

dobj(listing-5, stalls-8)
prep(listing-5, with-9)

pobj(with-9, fingers-11)
prep(fingers-11, of-12)
num(hand-14, one-13)
pobj(of-12, hand-14)

aux(bet-18, would-17)
conj(start-4, bet-18)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT This)
        (ADJP (RB very) (JJ popular))
        (NN stall))
      (PP (IN in)
        (NP (NNP Whampoa) (NN market))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (ADJP (JJ famous)
          (PP (IN for)
            (NP
              (NP (PRP$ their) (JJ dry) (NN version))
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP (DT a) (PRP$ their)
                  (ADJP (RB punchy) (JJ homemade))
                  (NNS chilli))))))
        (NN padi) (NN sauce)))
    (. .)))

  (S

                    (CC and)

    (, ,)))

          (NP (PRP it))
